DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Quality Recovery Outcome Between Systemic Lidocaine Dexamethasone Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: ASA III patient age 20 65 year undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy due gallbladder polyp asymptomatic gallstone without cholecystitis 1 . Steroid therapy immunocompromised patient 2 . Diabetes mellitus 3 . Allergy lidocaine dexamethasone 4 . Severe renal dysfunction ( serum creatinine 1.6mg/dl ) 5 . Severe liver disease ( liver enzymes two time normal value ) 6 . History atrioventricular block 7 . Have difficulty understand QoR40 ( 40item qualityofrecovery score system ) Korean language 8 . History physicologic disease
